html:
4.13.17  7:18 pm   what are you doing this easter?

     trying to make as much progress as possible on whatever the current project is

     also how to relax when u are stressed for no reason?

     breathe and think about the ground

4.13.17  7:16 pm   how would you describe a friend?

     probably someone whom you know and knows you, and whom you are comfortable with and is comfortable with you

4.13.17  6:51 pm   Why do you prefer to learn video editing (and everything else for all I know) through personal experience; and trial and error, rather than through research?

     i think experience is by far the best way to learn. except for walking, walking is much better learned through diligent academic research

4.13.17  6:45 pm   How do people know when they've run out of invisible ink?

     the same way they know it exists in the first place, which i actually don't know

4.13.17  6:27 pm   Considering how easy it is to install the youtube ad blocker, I don't think monetizing a video is such a moral conundrum. As to why everyone is bugging you about it, I think that they're placing themselves in your position and are a bit frustrated at the money being squandered for seemingly little reason. People are used to ads. The vast majority of channels have them. They are easily blocked if you so desire and it's believed that about 50% of people do so. It's money being thrown directly into the trash for the sake of martyrdom. I say this to clarify the position, so it's a bit less baffling that people seem to be clamoring for ads. I hope that helps.

     thank you

4.13.17  6:20 pm   why do some people dislike question marks?

     i don't know but i don't know anyone who dislikes them

4.13.17  6:08 pm   Was the "HIRING ALL POSITIONS" sign there when you moved in as well?

     yes

4.13.17  6:08 pm   If you could be a dog, what kind of dog?

     how about a super dog

4.13.17  6:02 pm   any thoughts on pineapples?

     they are crazy

4.13.17  5:59 pm   how do you feel about the censored version of hoj?

     there should not be one

4.13.17  5:51 pm   why does everyone want you to have ads in your videos?

     i don't know

4.13.17  5:25 pm   Is there way to jot down ideas when you're in the shower besides just memorizing them? It's okay if it's a short video idea but, when it's half a song worth of lyrics it gets semi-difficult to remember. Thanks!

     there are some memory tricks you can use, but ultimately these are not totally reliable. if you really take the process seriously, you just get out of the shower and write it down. it's not that hard, and you can feel proud that you take yourself seriously
4.13.17  5:17 pm   Silence, voice music, instrument music or voice + instrument music?

4.13.17  5:01 pm   Do you ever question our need to ask questions?

     no
4.13.17  4:55 pm   Do you have any pets?

4.13.17  4:51 pm   is the release date for the video 12/31/9999?

     the release date will be as soon as i can possibly finish it

4.13.17  4:20 pm   What do i do if i feel like im a failure in life?

     keep trying many different things and explore

4.13.17  3:58 pm   why did you use the mercator projection in history of japan

     i didn't

4.13.17  3:53 pm   How many times have you rewatched your own videos (mainly HoJ)?

     i generally don't watch them after they are finished. history of japan i have not seen since it was released

4.13.17  3:49 pm   opinions on the importance of typography when conveying information graphically

     it is important

4.13.17  3:48 pm   what, to you, is offputting about placing ads on your videos, in the face of the tens of thousands of dollars you could be making which would change your life. please don't hyperlink this question. thanks

     ads suck. i'm not sure if that answers your question

4.13.17  3:47 pm   Are you colourblind

     i don't think so

4.13.17  1:33 pm   how did you make the handwriting animation in "gotta write something down"?

     i wrote it, scanned it, and then probably deleted a little bit at a time
4.13.17  12:57 pm   how do you find the motivation to get stuff done without falling into the depths of nihilism
4.13.17  11:53 am   What does the "2 4 0" thing in your room symbolize / what is it for?
4.13.17  11:32 am   What originally made you want to create the videos and music that you do?

4.13.17  10:53 am   Do you answer questions in waves?

     more like blocks, i would say

4.13.17  10:49 am   Can you turn on ads and get money in your videos, like most popular 'history of japan' video?

     ok

4.13.17  10:32 am   what rhymes with multiple organsisms

     cult in the florida prisons
4.13.17  9:17 am   what is the answer to this question

4.13.17  9:01 am   will the video be released by tomorrow?

     that would be nice

4.13.17  8:58 am   Will the video be released by april 20th?

     that seems somewhat reasonable

4.13.17  7:47 am   what are your thoughts on feelings

     i think i made a whole site about that

4.13.17  7:20 am   Monetize your fucking videos

     i will do it when i get a chance

4.13.17  6:28 am   Do you feel rushed when people demand you release the new history video after you tease it on Instagram?

     i always feel rushed. but not for that reason
4.13.17  4:29 am   how do i not get sad because i have so many problems rigjt now please help

4.13.17  4:18 am   what is your favourite album of all time

     i prefer when albums adhere to the flow of time, not all time at the same time

4.13.17  4:14 am   Do you have the script of your current project memorized now?

     i would like to think i don't, but i probably do

     Are you tired of working on the same thing for such a long time?

     yes

4.13.17  3:35 am   How to be happier?

     think back to the last time you were the most happy. there is probably a clue there

4.13.17  2:49 am   you ever think about what a song means to a stranger vs what a song means to you?

     it's hard to know what songs mean to strangers

4.13.17  2:49 am   Do you like seven-minute songs?

     how i like a song depends more on the contents of the song than the length

4.13.17  2:10 am   if you were offered a record deal, would you probably accept it if it was from a small label? a big label? somewhere in-between?

     no, thankfully nowadays it is possible to publish music world wide with just the click of a button

4.13.17  1:18 am   is my dog cute?

     i don't know

4.13.17  1:16 am   do you believe that originality is a lie and that everything we could possibly realise is a composite of things that existed long before us

     no

4.13.17  1:10 am   how would other people describe you in two words

     i don't know

4.13.17  12:41 am   do you think you might get the video finished by the end of the month?

     that seems mostly plausible

4.13.17  12:31 am   Will hotewig reference the six second video you made on the same topic?

     no

4.13.17  12:25 am   What is the hexadecimal for a sort-of gold colour that is not actually gold but closer to web colour yellow but not web colour yellow?

     like maybe ffcc00 but i would recommend using the color picker with your own eyes so you can really get what you want instead of trying to describe it to someone else
4.13.17  12:03 am   Do you prefer cakes or pies?

4.12.17  11:58 pm   has the pressure of ppl's high expectations taken a significant toll on you during the process of making the video?

     no, they are not as high as mine anyway
